sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In the past, Russia's President Vladimir Putin has celebrated Christmas at crowded gatherings outside Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But this year, the country's most secure cathedral was ordered to stage a midnight Orthodox Christmas service, so Russia's leader could worship alone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Kremlin's conscripts have attended religious services too, despite Putin's unilateral request for a 36-hour truce in Ukraine appearing to have failed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Moscow has claimed its forces observed the ceasefire, but media reports say both sides exchanged artillery fire in the east of Ukraine after Putin's Friday deadline.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Though war rages on in the country, Ukrainians have tried to have a relatively normal Orthodox Christmas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In Kyiv's Pechersk Lavra Cathedral, hundreds attended the Christmas Day service, with many hearing it spoken in Ukrainian for the first time. A demonstration of independence from the Russian Orthodox Church.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: After days of embarrassment for U.S. Republicans, America has a new Speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Kevin McCarthy took the House's gavel despite concerted opposition from some hard right-wing representatives in his party.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: McCarthy was keen to thank the former president for his victory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: I do want to especially thank President Trump.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: I don't think anybody should doubt his influence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He was with me from the beginning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Somebody wrote the doubt of whether he was there, and he was all in.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We've got to do so much work to do, and he was a great influence to make that all happen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: So thank you, President Trump.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: McCarthy will face a tough time as Speaker speaker with a razor-thin Republican majority in the house and an already established group of rebels congratulations rules he agreed to also mean that it will be easier for members to eject him if they agree with his speakership tensions are mounting

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: between Brussels and Beijing after the EU agreed to strongly encourage mandatory Covid testing for tourists arriving in Europe from China.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The decision has angered the Chinese government, which considers the decision discriminatory against its citizens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Nonetheless, European countries are raising their defences.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In a tweet, the German Foreign Ministry urged its citizens to avoid travelling to China unless necessary, as Covid infections continue to overwhelm the Chinese health system.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Portugal has announced that from Sunday, all passengers arriving from China will have to show a negative Covid-19 test before boarding the plane.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Belgian authorities have also decided to follow the advice. At Brussels airport, wastewater from planes arriving from China is tested to prevent new variants of COVID from appearing. Two men have been hanged in Iran for allegedly killing a member of the military during nationwide

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: protests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Mohammad Mahdi Karami and Sayed Mohammad Hosseini were found guilty of what Iranian authorities call corruption on earth over their alleged involvement in the death of a paramilitary officer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Human rights groups have denounced what they described as a sham trial.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The EU has said it's appalled by the executions in connection with the protests that began in September, sparked by the death of Masa Amini.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Fast food giant McDonald's will close its doors in Kazakhstan due to supply restrictions,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: according to the local franchise operator.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The chain was shut down quite quickly, and it's a shame that there were simply no good suppliers of products in Kazakhstan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's just sad.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: McDonald's banned its Kazakh stores from buying meat from Russia after the war in Ukraine began.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Like many other businesses in Kazakhstan, the conflict has disrupted their supply chains.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Was the early release of Prince Harry's autobiography a mistake or a clever marketing operation?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: On Thursday, some bookstores in Spain like this one put the book up for sale by mistake. This shop assistant remembers how she sold the only copy they had by mistake and hadn't seen the note over the package banning sales before the 10th of January.
